title: 2008년 Alex Jermaine Johnson v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Alex Jermaine Johnson v. State. 판결일: 2008-09-05. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Alex Jermaine Johnson v. State
**판결일**: 2008-09-05
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약


















In The


Court of Appeals


Sixth Appellate District of Texas at Texarkana



______________________________



No. 06-08-00012-CR


______________________________




ALEX JOHNSON, Appellant



V.



THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee




                                              


On Appeal from the 124th Judicial District Court


Gregg County, Texas


Trial Court No. 36251-A




                                                 




Before Morriss, C.J., Carter and Moseley, JJ.


Memorandum Opinion by Justice Carter



MEMORANDUM OPINION



	After the trial court denied his motion to suppress evidence, Alex Johnson pled guilty to the
charge of aggravated assault and submitted the issue of punishment to the trial court.  The trial court
sentenced Johnson to fifteen years' imprisonment.  Johnson now appeals, raising three points of
error, but a problem with our jurisdiction prevents us from reaching the merits of those issues.  For
the reasons stated below, we dismiss this case for want of jurisdiction.

	The clerk's record in this case shows that, after the trial court had formally sentenced
Johnson, he executed a document entitled "Waiver of Motion for New Trial and Right of Appeal." 
In this waiver, Johnson acknowledged his right to appeal, but affirmatively (and with his trial
counsel's permission) waived that right.  Johnson further acknowledged this waiver was made...
